com.currencycloud.coolpay.mb

Class AbstractMB<T,PK>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.currencycloud.coolpay.mb.AbstractMB<T,PK>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - Entity class
    PK - Primary key data type
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    HomeMB, LoginMB, PaymentMB, RecipientMB

    public abstract class AbstractMB<T,PK>
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    This abstract class is used to implement some common functions which will be used in all forms.
    Since:
    1.5
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Tranquilo Dognini Neto
    See Also:
    LoginMB, PaymentMB, RecipientMB, Serialized Form

      Default constructor of the managed bean

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void actionCancel(javax.faces.event.ActionEvent evt)
      This method cancels a transaction with no changes on the system.
      void actionDone(javax.faces.event.ActionEvent evt)
      This method close the transaction (conversation) and finish the process.
      void actionNew(javax.faces.event.ActionEvent evt)
      Starts a transaction in order to create a new entity.
      void actionView(javax.faces.event.ActionEvent evt)
      This method is used to show the entity, and visualise the details of it.
      java.lang.String getCurrencySymbol()
      This method states the default Locale in order to show in the user interface with the number.
      int getDefaultFractionDigits()
      Used in the view, this method states the default fraction digits in order to show at the user interface de number rendered properly.
      PK getId()
      Returns the PK which is the primary key of the entity.
      java.lang.String getLocale()
      This method provides the Locale in order to configure the number properly on the user interface.
      boolean isManaged()
      This method returns the state of the forms edit and view.
      void setId(PK id)
      Defines the PK which is the primary key of the entity.
      void setManaged(boolean managed)
      This method is used to define the state of the forms edit and view.

      • actionNew

        public void actionNew(javax.faces.event.ActionEvent evt)
        Starts a transaction in order to create a new entity. this is a generic method which can be used by default, I mean, without any further implementation on the inherited classes, and also can be extended, if necessary to do so.
        Parameters:
        evt - Expects the event triggered on the user interface.
